parameters.name: usd::serialize.hostName
parameters.description: Nucleus server name. If not present, output will be routed to local disk.

parameters.name: usd::serialize.newSession
parameters.description: Is a new session directory created on device commit, or the last (ie. highest numbered) one reused.

parameters.name: usd::writeAtCommit
parameters.description: (Experimental) Output USD as much as possible at commit of objects instead of anariRenderFrame

parameters.name: usd::output.previewSurfaceShader
parameters.description: Output materials according to the USD preview surface schema

parameters.name: usd::output.mdlShader
parameters.description: Output materials according to the Omniverse MDL schema

parameters.name: usd::garbageCollect
parameters.description: Instruct the USD device to remove USD output of objects that are not referenced within USD by other objects

parameters.name: usd::removeUnusedNames
parameters.description: Clean up the name cache for object name generation and uniqueness checks

parameters.name: usd::connection.logVerbosity
parameters.description: Verbosity of logging information from the Nucleus connection, with the highest value being the loudest, similar to debug.

parameters.name: usd::enableSaving
parameters.description: Allows the USD output to be written out, or just updated in memory if disabled. Useful in conjunction with usd::sceneStage.

parameters.name: usd::time
parameters.description: Timestep of the geometry object (default defers to ANARI_DEVICE usd::time)

parameters.name: usd::attribute0.name
parameters.description: Alternative name for attribute0 primvar output

parameters.name: usd::attribute1.name
parameters.description: Alternative name for attribute1 primvar output

parameters.name: usd::attribute2.name
parameters.description: Alternative name for attribute2 primvar output

parameters.name: usd::attribute3.name
parameters.description: Alternative name for attribute3 primvar output

parameters.name: usd::removePrim
parameters.description: Explicitly delete prim from USD output after commit

parameters.name: usd::time
parameters.description: Timestep of the geometry object (default defers to ANARI_DEVICE usd::time)

parameters.name: usd::removePrim
parameters.description: Explicitly delete prim from USD output after commit

parameters.name: usd::time
parameters.description: Timestep of the geometry object (default defers to ANARI_DEVICE usd::time)

parameters.name: usd::useUsdGeomPoints
parameters.description: For sphere geometries, use UsdGeomPoints instead of UsdGeomPointInstancer to represent the spheres. Cannot be changed after the first commit.

parameters.name: usd::removePrim
parameters.description: Explicitly delete prim from USD output after commit

parameters.name: usd::time.shapeGeometry
parameters.description: The timestep of the object attached to the shapeGeometry parameter of the glyph geometry, at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::removePrim
parameters.description: Explicitly delete prim from USD output after commit

parameters.name: usd::time
parameters.description: Timestep of the material object (default defers to ANARI_DEVICE usd::time)

parameters.name: usd::time.sampler.color
parameters.description: The timestep of the sampler object attached to the color parameter of the material (if so), at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::time.sampler.opacity
parameters.description: The timestep of the sampler object attached to the opacity parameter of the material (if so), at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::removePrim
parameters.description: Explicitly delete prim from USD output after commit

parameters.name: usd::time
parameters.description: Timestep of the material object (default defers to ANARI_DEVICE usd::time)

parameters.name: usd::time.sampler.baseColor
parameters.description: The timestep of the sampler object attached to the baseColor parameter of the material (if so), at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::time.sampler.opacity
parameters.description: The timestep of the sampler object attached to the opacity parameter of the material (if so), at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::time.sampler.emissive
parameters.description: The timestep of the sampler object attached to the emissive parameter of the material (if so), at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::time.sampler.roughness
parameters.description: The timestep of the sampler object attached to the roughness parameter of the material (if so), at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::time.sampler.metallic
parameters.description: The timestep of the sampler object attached to the metallic parameter of the material (if so), at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::time.sampler.ior
parameters.description: The timestep of the sampler object attached to the ior parameter of the material (if so), at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.

parameters.name: usd::preClassified
parameters.description: Use preclassification to produce a VDB grid with a color and opacity field, instead of a density field

parameters.name: usd::time.value
parameters.description: The timestep of the object attached to the value parameter of the volume, at the timestep of the device/scene for the next commit. The default value is the object's time parameter, or otherwise the device value if left unset.
